title: Garlic Bread 🍞 (3 ways) | Snack
content:
Who says 'No' to this wonderful recipe : Garlic Bread 🍞 (3 ways) As I have done this with in few minutes, if bread slices are available at home then it's super simple and quick yummy snack recipe for everyone 😋 at home 🏡 Today, I prepared garlic bread in 3 ways they're garlic bread , garlic cheese bread and the other one with Italian seasoning. All three types of garlic bread turned out so yum and you can't wait to pick the next one ☺️ I hope you like it and try at home and let me know how it turned out yo you. Happy Cooking & have a nice day 🙂 Servings: 3 Duration: 10 mins Ingredients:
  • Bread slices - 4
  • Garlic - finely chopped - 5 cloves - peeled off
  • Cilantro - finely chopped - 1/4 cup
  • Red chilly flakes - 1/2 tsp
  • Italian seasoning - 1/2 tsp
  • Mozzarella Cheese - 4 tb sb - grated
  • Salt - 1/4 tsp
  • Butter - 3 tb sp - melted
Procedure:
  • Preheat oven @395 F/ 200 C
  • Add salt, garlic and cilantro in butter, mix well
Garlic Bread:
  • Apply on bread slice by using butter brush
Garlic bread with Italian seasoning:
  • Apply on second bread slice by using butter brush
  • Next, Sprinkle red chilly flakes and Italian seasoning (as shown in picture)
Garlic Cheese Bread:
  • Apply on the other bread slice by using butter brush
  • Spread mozzarella cheese and sprinkle cilantro
  • Place bread slices on baking tray lined with wax paper and Bake 8 mins
  • Take out carefully and serve hot with tomato ketchup 😋 Or any dip (as shown in picture)
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Garlic bread can also make with Baguette 🥖 instead of bread slices and rest of the process same
  • While serving Apply butter
  • You can replace cilantro with parsley.. it tastes great as well
  • Serve immediately
